member_organisations: ABIEC members: Saint Gobain Romania, Tenaris Silcotub, ArcelorMittal Galati, CRH Romania, Alro SA Slatina, Doosan IMGB SA
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
- A policy framework for climate and energy in the period from 2020 to 2030 (COM/2014/015) 
- Proposal for a decision concerning the establishment and operation of a market stability reserve for the Union 
greenhouse gas emission trading scheme (COM/2014/020) 
- Initiatives under the Clean Energy Package 
- Proposal amending Directive 2003/87/EC to enhance cost-effective emission reduction and low-carbon investments (COM/2015/337)
organisation_name: Association of Big Industrial Energy Consumers Romania (ABIEC)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
- Consultation on Emission Trading System (ETS) post-2020 carbon leakage provisions 
- Consultation on the Preparation of a new renewable energy directive for the period after 2020 
- High-Level Conference on Energy-Intensive Industries in follow-up to the Extra-ordinary Competitiveness Council on Steel  
- Metal By-Products Recovery Conference
goals__remit: ABIEC represents the voice of Romanian big energy industry consumers on all matters relevant for their industrial competitiveness - such as energy, trade, climate change, industrial policy.
